H0.text: In Greek legend, who opened a box containing all evil. Persephone

H1.text: In Greek legend, who opened a box containing all evil. Gaia

H2.text: In Greek legend, who opened a box containing all evil. Hera

H3.text: In Greek legend, who opened a box containing all evil. Pandora

A4.text: Pandora opened a jar left in her care containing sickness, death and many other unspecified evils which were then released into the world.
